Class HistoryAdapter.AttemptViewHolder

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
com.purnendu.quizo.adapters.HistoryAdapter.AttemptViewHolder
Enclosing class:
HistoryAdapter
public static class HistoryAdapter.AttemptViewHolder extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
A ViewHolder describes an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView. This inner class holds references to all UI components within a single history item layout.
